about_the_game:
The Machines Arena is an adrenaline-fueled PvP game where unique heroes battle competitively in teams of 4v4 for some pulse-pounding mayhem, delivered in a top-down perspective. Pick a hero that suits your personality, style, and killer instinct, and dive right into the action!

  • Quick Matches: PvP battles last just 5 to 7 minutes — perfect for dominating or being dominated anytime, anywhere

  • Competitive Ranked Mode — duke it out to become the ultimate champion

  • PvE ‘Death Run’: A single-player rogue-lite mode with endless, increasingly difficult rooms packed with challenges

  • 9 PvP Heroes: Each hero comes with specialized abilities and weapons, offering distinct playstyles

  • Customizations: Stand out on the battlefield with custom skins and bring your Familiar into combat

  • Exclusive PvE Hero: Play as XE, collecting permanent power-ups and customizing builds to adapt to your PvE strategy

  • Multiple Game Modes & Map Types — no triumphant victory or crushing defeat is ever the same

  • Join the action with friends, link up with a team, or have some solo fun

  • Easy to learn, hard to master gameplay: Hone your skills in training rooms before bringing your best into the arena

  • Flexible Controls: Choose your preferred setup, whether it’s a controller or mouse and keyboard

  • No Paywalls: All current heroes are available from the start, with no additional purchases required

  • Fair Play: Ranked mode balances hero stats to ensure a level playing field for everyone

content_descriptors.notes:
This game features frequent depictions of combat between robotic characters in a MOBA-style format, involving realistic and intense violence. Players will encounter scenes of destruction, explosions, and mechanical dismemberment, as well as sound effects and visuals designed to enhance the impact of battles.

The game does not include depictions of sexual acts, nudity, or human violence, but its intense combat scenarios may not be suitable for all audiences. There are no references to drug or alcohol abuse, self-harm, or other sensitive topics in the storyline.

Players who may be sensitive to scenes of fast-paced, competitive violence or depictions of mechanical destruction should take this into consideration before playing.
